BBK01.SU0024: Deposit rates of banks / Savings deposits with minimum rates of return, with agreed notice of 3 months / Highest rate of spread

General: Only a minimum rate of return is granted, but not a premium or bonus. Until June 1993 savings deposits at statutory notice. Since January 1991 the rates of banks in the new Länder have been included in the interest rate survey. The spread is ascertained by eliminating the reports in the top 5% and the bottom 5% of the interest rate range.
